title: Number of visitors to the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in the U.S. 2008 to 2019
summary: Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. Park in the U.S. attracted a total of approximately 4.58 millions visitors in 2019 , down from its visitation peak of 5.6 millions in 2015 .
A Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. uniting nations Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. Park 's name derived from the many glaciers that shaped its topography for over 5.6 millions years .

Located in Montana on the Canada-U.S. border , Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. Park is the second half of the Glacier-Waterton International Peace Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. , the first half being Waterton Lakes Vietnam Veterans Memorial U.S. in Canada .
